Tuesday 1940
Left Bellingham at 9:00AM. and didn't get to school until 10:00AM Went to Guides. Did a lot of signaling Went to Mr. Ward's orchestra. We sounded swueaky after hearing Kriesler.

Friday 1942
Came to Seattle after school with Dad & Mr Lewis. Am so excited I can hardly write. Don & Art came over tonight. Don taught me the tip in dancing. Oh boy. Told Art to write to Gerry. Fr Beglin came in for a few minutes Got some PepsiCola and just drank oodles of it. Mary Doreen Don Art & I talked till 1230AM.

Saturday 1943
Washed all outside of windows in kitchen and living room. Felt rotten as Mom made me go to bed at noon. Slept till nearly 4 o'clock. Finished Bob's letter. Wrote 15 pages. Got letter and picture from him. Seems funny ot see him in salors outfit. Got letter from Frankie.

Sunday 1944
Went to 11 Mass. Trudie & Peggy came up for records this AM. Mansifields came in awhile this PM. Slept  from 2-5 this PM. Went skating. Had one super time with Ted Marigrace & Pat N. The latter & Don also Getty & Ken didn't show up last night Studied Biology for exam on tuesday.
